# Radmin3toHashcat
Quick script to convert Radmin Server 3 registry keys to hash files for Hashcat

Used for CMIYC 2024 contest. 

# Usage

I just dropped the text output from the registry key dump directly to a file. The script will parse each registry key and output the Hashcat compatible hash to a file.

```
python3 radmin3tohashcat.py registry_entries.txt radmin3hashes.txt
$radmin3$61006e006e006d0061007200690065007400*675f2d6852d6763cef3aaa54763a2479d3130ecdd22ec3a7b8d35e7aa2fa19f3*
$radmin3$6400690072006b0061006c006f006e007a006f00*e7dbeb9d72e04a7dc0b7cd6dd201827fea08806f9304b48385ba41c85309ad16*
$radmin3$6e00650069006c0073006b0065006c0074006f00*b6d9488c66c0e2a72629d2bec204f8c2b1b1f8b74ad347e67860d63d25406a26*
```

## Acknowledgements
* <https://github.com/synacktiv/Radmin3-Password-Cracker>: Logic to convert was largely pulled from here. Great utility, but sadly but did not support multiple registry key inputs, nor did it output the data I needed.
